an5.175:1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
an5.175:1.5: kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti no kammaṃ;
an5.175:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
an5.175:2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
an5.175:2.5: akotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, kammaṃ pacceti no maṅgalaṃ;
an5.175:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañcā”ti.
